[Discern Lies](/Spells.aspx?ID=74)
<actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Divination" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=47" />
<trait label="Mental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=106" />
<trait label="Revelation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=138" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 330 <sup>4.0</sup>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Divine](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=2), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3)

<row gap="medium">

**Cast** [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 10 minutes
</row>

</column>

---

Falsehoods ring in your ears like discordant notes. You gain a +4 status bonus to Perception checks when someone [Lies](/Actions.aspx?ID=47).
name: Discern Lies
